annotations: 5/1998 8/2004 SQL Database Admin Coca Cola Vietnam Hanoi Vietnam Main duties Ensure that new database code meets company standards for readability reliability and performance Each week give developers a list of the top 10 most resource intensive queries on the server and suggest ways to improve performance on each Design indexes for existing applications choosing when to add or remove indexes When users complain about the performance of a particular query help developers improve the performance of that query by tweaking it or modifying indexes Conduct SQL Server lunch and learn sessions for application developers Advise developers on the most efficient database designs tables data types stored procedures functions etc.
